lead_paragraph: Ivory Coast international Serge Aurier was handed his first Paris St Germain start since insulting coach Laurent Blanc for their Champions League quarter-final first leg against Manchester City on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Aurier Handed First PSG Start Since Insulting Coach Blanc
headline.main: Aurier Handed First PSG Start Since Insulting Coach Blanc

snippet: Ivory Coast international Serge Aurier was handed his first Paris St Germain start since insulting coach Laurent Blanc for their Champions League quarter-final first leg against Manchester City on Wednesday....
